name: @hitachivantara/uikit-react-viz
description: A collection of React visualizations for the Hitachi Vantara's Design System.

scripts.build: npx npm-run-all --npm-path npm --serial clean build:babel build:post:**
scripts.build:babel:node: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs npx babel --root-mode upward src -d dist --extensions '.js,.jsx' --source-maps --ignore '**/tests','**/stories' --copy-files --no-copy-ignored
scripts.build:babel:legacy: cross-env BABEL_ENV=legacy npx babel --root-mode upward src -d dist/legacy --extensions '.js,.jsx' --source-maps --ignore '**/tests','**/stories' --copy-files --no-copy-ignored
scripts.build:babel:modern: cross-env BABEL_ENV=modern npx babel --root-mode upward src -d dist/modern --extensions '.js,.jsx' --source-maps --ignore '**/tests','**/stories' --copy-files --no-copy-ignored
scripts.dev:babel:watch: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs npx babel --root-mode upward src -d dist --extensions '.js,.jsx' --source-maps --ignore '**/tests','**/stories' --copy-files --no-copy-ignored --watch
